mapper.select: SELECT distinct pa.iproduct, pa.ipayment, pp.stored_pic as ProStoredPic, pa.deposit, pa.total_price as totalPrice, pa.rental_end_date as rentalEndDate , pa.rental_start_date as rentalStartDate, pa.duration, pa.created_at as createdAt, pai.`status`, pr.iuser, u.nick, u.stored_pic as userPic from payment pa LEFT JOIN payment_info pai ON pa.ipayment = pai.ipayment LEFT JOIN product pr ON pa.iproduct = pr.iproduct LEFT JOIN prod_pics pp ON pp.iproduct = pa.iproduct JOIN `user` u ON u.iuser = pr.iuser WHERE pa.iuser = 10 GROUP BY pa.ipayment ORDER BY pa.ipayment DESC LIMIT 0, 10

SELECT distinct pr.iproduct, pa.ipayment, pp.stored_pic as ProStoredPic, pa.deposit, pa.total_price as totalPrice, pa.rental_end_date as rentalEndDate , pa.rental_start_date as rentalStartDate, pa.duration, pa.created_at as createdAt, pai.`status`, pr.iuser, u.nick, u.stored_pic as userPic FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN product pr ON u.iuser = pr.iuser LEFT JOIN prod_pics pp ON pp.iproduct = pr.iproduct LEFT JOIN payment pa ON pa.iproduct = pr.iproduct LEFT JOIN payment_info pai ON pa.ipayment = pai.ipayment WHERE pr.iuser = #{iuser} GROUP BY pr.iproduct ORDER BY pr.iproduct DESC LIMIT 0, 10

SELECT B.iuser, A.nick, A.stored_pic AS loginedUserPic, D.imain_category AS imainCategory, D.isub_category AS isubCategory, D.iproduct, D.title, D.stored_pic AS prodPic, B.ireview, B.rating, B.`contents` FROM user A LEFT JOIN review B ON A.iuser = B.iuser LEFT JOIN product_payment C ON B.ipayment = C.ipayment LEFT JOIN product D ON C.iproduct = D.iproduct WHERE B.iuser = #{iuser}

SELECT A.updated_at AS updatedAt, A.iproduct, A.price, A.deposit, A.title, A.stored_pic AS prodPic, A.imain_category AS imainCategory, A.isub_category AS isubCategory, B.iuser AS loginedIuser, B.nick, B.stored_pic AS pic FROM product A LEFT JOIN user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser JOIN like C ON A.iproduct = C.iproduct WHERE C.iuser = #{loginedIuser} ORDER BY A.updated_at DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{rowCount}

SELECT R.ireview, R.contents, R.rating, R.iuser, U.nick, U.stored_pic as userProfPic, P.iproduct, P.imain_category AS imainCategory, P.isub_category AS isubCategory FROM product P JOIN product_payment PP on P.iproduct = PP.iproduct JOIN review R on PP.ipayment = R.ipayment JOIN user U on R.iuser = U.iuser where P.iuser = #{iuser} and R.contents != '' and R.rating > 0
